```plaintext
my-nocturn-xray-workflow/
├─ X-ray Machine 
│   └─ Captures imaging data and exports a `.pca` file
├─ .pca File
│   └─ Generated by the X-ray machine, stored in a shared folder
├─ Raspberry Pi (Raspi)
│   ├─ Monitors the shared folder for new `.pca` files
│   ├─ Processes the `.pca` file (e.g., extracting metadata)
│   └─ Commits metadata/results to the GitHub NOCTURN Repo
├─ GitHub NOCTURN Repo
│   ├─ facility-1-branch  # Where facility-specific metadata is stored
│   ├─ facility-2-branch
│   └─ facility-n-branch
├─ GitHub Agent
│   ├─ Defined in `.github/workflows/agent_actions.yml`
│   └─ Uses the GitHub API to automate tasks (e.g., push, CI, etc.)
├─ GitHub API
│   └─ Receives requests/commits from the GitHub Agent
└─ iDigBio API
    └─ Receives final metadata from the NOCTURN Repo/Agent for indexing
